conversations.content: What was the date of the speech given by Imam Khamenei?
The speech was given on October 2, 2024.
Who delivered the speech on October 2, 2024?
The speech was delivered by Imam Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
Where did the meeting take place?
The meeting took place in the Imam Khomeini Hussainiyah.
Who were the attendees of the meeting?
The attendees were hundreds of the academic elites, top participants in the Olympiads, and outstanding scientific talents.
What was the purpose of the meeting?
The purpose of the meeting was to discuss important matters related to the academic elite and their role in the country's development.
What did Imam Khamenei mention about Dr. Afshin's plans?
Imam Khamenei mentioned that Dr. Afshin discussed his future programs and plans, which made him happy and hopeful.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the comments and suggestions made by the attendees?
Imam Khamenei said that the comments, discussions, research, and suggestions shared by the attendees merit consideration, attention, and follow-up.
What did Imam Khamenei identify as a lack in the current efforts?
Imam Khamenei identified a lack of follow-up in the current efforts, stating that while there are plenty of plans and programs, there is not enough follow-up to ensure their implementation.
What did Imam Khamenei suggest to ensure the implementation of plans?
Imam Khamenei suggested that to ensure the implementation of plans, there needs to be follow-up. He advised finding out how to implement and achieve these things.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the statements made by the young people?

Imam Khamenei said that seven of the country’s top talents came and spoke about various subjects, ranging from industry and economics to the humanities, and that these statements should be considered and acted upon.
What did Imam Khamenei recommend to the Vice President for Science and Technology?
Imam Khamenei recommended that the Vice President for Science and Technology should consult with the one who made the suggestion and follow up on it to ensure that it is carried out.
What was the reason for not postponing the meeting?
The reason for not postponing the meeting was that the orientation toward talented individuals and the pursuit of excellence must not be delayed, even during a time of mourning.
What message did Imam Khamenei want to convey through the meeting?

The message Imam Khamenei wanted to convey was that even though the country is in mourning, it should not mean sitting in despair. Instead, the mourning should propel them to move forward and make progress.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the loss of Mr. Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah?
Imam Khamenei said that the loss of Mr. Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah is very important and truly grieves them.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the atmosphere in the country?
Imam Khamenei said that the atmosphere in the country is one of mourning and it truly is a time of grief.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the orientation toward talented individuals?
Imam Khamenei said that the orientation toward talented individuals and the pursuit of excellence must not be delayed.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the nature of their mourning?
Imam Khamenei said that their mourning is of the same nature as that of mourning for Imam Hussain (pbuh). It is alive and revives them, propelling them to move forward and make progress.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the issues in Lebanon and the martyr Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah?

Imam Khamenei said that he has some things to say regarding the issues in Lebanon and matters that are related to their distinguished dear martyr Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah, which he will discuss in the near future, God willing.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the reality of outstanding talent in the country?
Imam Khamenei said that the reality of outstanding talent in the country is that Iran is among the leading nations in the world in terms of IQ, ranking third among the top 23 countries.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the denial of Iranian competency and abilities?
Imam Khamenei said that some people still deny the competency and abilities of Iranians, just as they did some 90 or 100 years ago. They either ignore this talent or deny it.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the potential of the country's intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that the potential of the country's intellectual elite is significant and that the country's assets, including its talented individuals and the background that fosters their growth, should be recognized and utilized.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the most important aspect of an outstanding talent?
Imam Khamenei said that the most important aspect of an outstanding talent is IQ, and Iran is among the leading nations in the world in this area.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the average IQ of the Iranian nation?

Imam Khamenei said that Iran ranks third among the top 23 countries in the world in terms of average IQ, according to a report from an international center dedicated to measuring the IQ of different nations.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the attention given to outstanding talent before the Revolution?
Imam Khamenei said that no attention was given to the issue of outstanding talent and the cultivation of the intellectual elite before the Revolution. The focus was on other matters.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the attention given to the abilities of the young intellectual elite after the Revolution?
Imam Khamenei said that after the Revolution, attention was paid to the abilities of the young intellectual elite in the country, leading to significant achievements in various fields.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for more work in the area of outstanding talent?
Imam Khamenei said that more work needs to be done in the area of outstanding talent, as it is not being done to the extent that it should be in the country.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for the involvement of the intellectual elite in various fields?

Imam Khamenei said that the intellectual elite need to be involved in various fields such as water, oil, gas, nuclear energy, nanotechnology, new sciences such as artificial intelligence, and other sciences.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the establishment of the National Elites Foundation?
Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of the National Elites Foundation was aimed at identifying the nation’s top talent and involving them in important tasks.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of the academic elite feeling their presence has an impact?

Imam Khamenei said that the academic elite should sense that their presence has an impact on the country, and that the entire system must strive to make use of the academic elite so that they will feel that their presence is useful.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for the academic elite to feel like they can continue to grow?
Imam Khamenei said that the academic elite need to feel like they can continue to grow and research, and that they should be provided with the tools they need to do so.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for laboratories and workshops for the academic elite?
Imam Khamenei said that laboratories, big workshops, and creating strong connections with industry, agriculture, and mining are necessary for the academic elite to continue to grow and research.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of think tanks for the intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of think tanks is an important place where the intellectual elite can become involved, and that government assistance is essential for now if we want to have active think tanks.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the role of the Vice President for Science and Technology in connecting think tanks?
Imam Khamenei said that the Vice President for Science and Technology should serve as a connecting link between these think tanks and relevant organizations.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the harmful effects of bureaucracy on the intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that bureaucracy is harmful to the intellectual elite and can discourage them completely, and that the respected Vice President for Science and Technology should make the best use of this vast pool of talented human resources.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the responsibilities of the intellectual elite?
Imam Khamenei said that the intellectual elite are responsible and have greater responsibilities than the average person because they have benefited more from God’s blessings.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for a new scientific leap in the country?
Imam Khamenei said that there is a need for a new scientific leap in the country, and that the academic elite are the main driving force behind this change.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of scientific superiority over rivals and ill-wishers?
Imam Khamenei said that scientific superiority is important because it can prevent the enemy from striking large populations and can help overcome rivals and ill-wishers.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the establishment of knowledge-based companies?

Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of knowledge-based companies is an urgent recommendation to the intellectual elite, and that the number of such companies anticipated by the end of the [Seventh Development] Plan is 30,000.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the root of the problem in the region?
Imam Khamenei said that the root of the problem in the region is the presence of those who claim to advocate peace in the region, such as the United States and some European countries.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the impact of the presence of the US and certain European countries in the region?

Imam Khamenei said that the presence of the US and certain European countries in the region is the main cause of the problems in the region, and that if their villainy is removed, these conflicts, wars, and confrontations will be completely eliminated.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the hope for removing enemies from the region?

Imam Khamenei said that with God’s help, the hard effort of the Iranian people, inspiration drawn from the Islamic Revolution, and collaboration with other nations, they will remove their enemies from the region, God willing.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the greetings, mercy, and blessings of God?
Imam Khamenei said that may God’s greetings, mercy, and blessings be upon you.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of recognizing the country's assets?

Imam Khamenei said that one of the worst afflictions for an individual, a group, or a nation is them not recognizing their own assets, and that the country's most important asset is its talented individuals and the background that fosters their growth.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the attempts of adversaries to hide or deny the country's assets?

Imam Khamenei said that the adversaries of the country try to hide or deny the country's assets, and that we must not accept or tolerate their attempts but instead strive to recognize our country’s assets.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of IQ in the growth of the intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that the most important factor and capacity needed for the growth of the intellectual elite is a person’s intelligence quotient (IQ), and that Iran is among the leading nations in the world in this area.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need to activate and put into action a person's IQ?
Imam Khamenei said that a person’s IQ must be activated and put into action, and that the necessary background for this must be provided.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the tremendous asset of the high average IQ in the country?

Imam Khamenei said that the fact that the average IQ in the country is so high is a tremendous asset and an extraordinary human resource, surpassing everything else we have in the country, including minerals, resources, and geographical position.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the focus on other matters before the Revolution?
Imam Khamenei said that before the Revolution, the focus was on other matters and no attention was given to the issue of outstanding talent and the cultivation of the intellectual elite.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the achievements of the youth after the Revolution?
Imam Khamenei said that after the Revolution, attention was paid to the abilities of the young intellectual elite in the country, leading to significant achievements in various fields.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for more work in the area of outstanding talent?
Imam Khamenei said that more work needs to be done in the area of outstanding talent, as it is not being done to the extent that it should be in the country.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for the involvement of the intellectual elite in various fields?

Imam Khamenei said that the intellectual elite need to be involved in various fields such as water, oil, gas, nuclear energy, nanotechnology, new sciences such as artificial intelligence, and other sciences.

Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of the National Elites Foundation was aimed at identifying the nation’s top talent and involving them in important tasks.

Imam Khamenei said that the Vice President for Science and Technology should serve as a connecting link between these think tanks and relevant organizations.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the harmful effects of bureaucracy on the intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that bureaucracy is harmful to the intellectual elite and can discourage them completely, and that the respected Vice President for Science and Technology should make the best use of this vast pool of talented human resources.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the responsibilities of the intellectual elite?
Imam Khamenei said that the intellectual elite are responsible and have greater responsibilities than the average person because they have benefited more from God’s blessings.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for a new scientific leap in the country?
Imam Khamenei said that there is a need for a new scientific leap in the country, and that the academic elite are the main driving force behind this change.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of scientific superiority over rivals and ill-wishers?
Imam Khamenei said that scientific superiority is important because it can prevent the enemy from striking large populations and can help overcome rivals and ill-wishers.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the establishment of knowledge-based companies?

Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of knowledge-based companies is an urgent recommendation to the intellectual elite, and that the number of such companies anticipated by the end of the [Seventh Development] Plan is 30,000.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the root of the problem in the region?
Imam Khamenei said that the root of the problem in the region is the presence of those who claim to advocate peace in the region, such as the United States and some European countries.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the impact of the presence of the US and certain European countries in the region?

Imam Khamenei said that the presence of the US and certain European countries in the region is the main cause of the problems in the region, and that if their villainy is removed, these conflicts, wars, and confrontations will be completely eliminated.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the hope for removing enemies from the region?

Imam Khamenei said that with God’s help, the hard effort of the Iranian people, inspiration drawn from the Islamic Revolution, and collaboration with other nations, they will remove their enemies from the region, God willing.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the greetings, mercy, and blessings of God?
Imam Khamenei said that may God’s greetings, mercy, and blessings be upon you.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of recognizing the country's assets?

Imam Khamenei said that one of the worst afflictions for an individual, a group, or a nation is them not recognizing their own assets, and that the country's most important asset is its talented individuals and the background that fosters their growth.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the attempts of adversaries to hide or deny the country's assets?

Imam Khamenei said that the adversaries of the country try to hide or deny the country's assets, and that we must not accept or tolerate their attempts but instead strive to recognize our country’s assets.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of IQ in the growth of the intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that the most important factor and capacity needed for the growth of the intellectual elite is a person’s intelligence quotient (IQ), and that Iran is among the leading nations in the world in this area.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need to activate and put into action a person's IQ?
Imam Khamenei said that a person’s IQ must be activated and put into action, and that the necessary background for this must be provided.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the tremendous asset of the high average IQ in the country?

Imam Khamenei said that the fact that the average IQ in the country is so high is a tremendous asset and an extraordinary human resource, surpassing everything else we have in the country, including minerals, resources, and geographical position.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the focus on other matters before the Revolution?
Imam Khamenei said that before the Revolution, the focus was on other matters and no attention was given to the issue of outstanding talent and the cultivation of the intellectual elite.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the achievements of the youth after the Revolution?
Imam Khamenei said that after the Revolution, attention was paid to the abilities of the young intellectual elite in the country, leading to significant achievements in various fields.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for more work in the area of outstanding talent?
Imam Khamenei said that more work needs to be done in the area of outstanding talent, as it is not being done to the extent that it should be in the country.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for the involvement of the intellectual elite in various fields?

Imam Khamenei said that the intellectual elite need to be involved in various fields such as water, oil, gas, nuclear energy, nanotechnology, new sciences such as artificial intelligence, and other sciences.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the establishment of the National Elites Foundation?
Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of the National Elites Foundation was aimed at identifying the nation’s top talent and involving them in important tasks.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of the academic elite feeling their presence has an impact?

Imam Khamenei said that the academic elite should sense that their presence has an impact on the country, and that the entire system must strive to make use of the academic elite so that they will feel that their presence is useful.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for the academic elite to feel like they can continue to grow?
Imam Khamenei said that the academic elite need to feel like they can continue to grow and research, and that they should be provided with the tools they need to do so.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the need for laboratories and workshops for the academic elite?
Imam Khamenei said that laboratories, big workshops, and creating strong connections with industry, agriculture, and mining are necessary for the academic elite to continue to grow and research.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of think tanks for the intellectual elite?

Imam Khamenei said that the establishment of think tanks is an important place where the intellectual elite can become involved, and that government assistance is essential for now if we want to have active think tanks.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the role of the Vice President for Science and Technology in connecting think tanks?
Imam Khamenei said that the Vice President for Science and Technology should serve as a connecting link between these think tanks and relevant organizations.
